name: Ultra Bug Blaster MAX
description:
An infinite survival shooter with lots of juice created by @hazulu and @villainousmode

Ultra Bug Blaster MAX is a twin-stick survival shooter inspired by classic shoot-em-up and arcade survival games. Initially intended to bring a breath of fresh air for a lacking genre to mobile, the game was later adapted to be playable on PC.

While the gameplay is simple, you'll never go thirsty with the amount of juice this game provides. This game was crafted by utilizing the art of screen shake to maximally enhance your gaming experience.

Wondering why you're a space-bunny named Max fighting off bugs until you die? Why are there gigantic bugs?? Why are some of them shooting at you??? Where are their guns???? NO TIME TO THINK, BETTER START SHOOTING!!!!!

---Features---
  • High-intensity gameplay with increasing difficulty over time.
  • Classic Shooter Experience inspired by popular shmups-- you'll feel familiar from the very beginning.
  • Sick Music made by Evan King.
---Controls---
  • Movement: WASD
  • Dodge: Space or Shift
  • Toggle Shoot: LMB
  • Increase Window Size: Z
  • Fullscreen: Alt + Enter
  • Skip Intro/End Match Sequence: LMB or Space or Enter

Thank you to Evan King for his amazing sound effects and music! And thank you to Juhani Junkala for his retro sound pack.
